[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-logger/src/security.rs] [Enum: SecurityEvent::InvalidConsensusRound] [Missing attack vectors] Does InvalidConsensusRound fail to distinguish between accidental clock skew and intentional round manipulation attacks, allowing attackers to blend in with legitimate clock issues? [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-logger/src/security.rs] [Impl: Schema for SecurityEvent] [Serialization vulnerability] Could the visit() implementation using Value::from_serde() introduce deserialization vulnerabilities if log data is later parsed from untrusted sources? (Medium)
